sentences.en: Courage and cowardice are not involved.
sentences.cn: 这并不牵涉到勇敢和怯懦问题.

sentences.en: cowardice in the face of danger
He openly accused his opponents of cowardice.
sentences.cn: 他公然指责对手胆小懦弱。

sentences.en: He threw out hints of cowardice.
sentences.cn: 他转弯抹角地说,这跟怯懦是分不开的.

sentences.en: He was deeply aware of his cowardice.
Her cowardice began to trouble her in a way.
sentences.cn: 对自己的怯场,她现在感到有些懊恼了.

sentences.en: His cowardice made him a byword to all who knew him.
sentences.cn: 由于他的懦弱,他在认识他的人中已被当作笑料.

sentences.en: His cowardice reflects on his character.
sentences.cn: 他的胆怯对他的性格带来不良影响.

sentences.en: His refusal to help simply pinpointed his cowardice.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝帮助正显示他的胆小.

sentences.en: How I despised myself for my cowardice!
sentences.cn: 我是多么鄙视自己的怯懦啊！

sentences.en: If he funks it, he will confirm the impression of cowardice given by his recent letter.
sentences.cn: 如果他对此畏缩，那就会证实他在最近一封信里表现出来的怯懦。

sentences.en: The smell of cowardice is too strong here.
sentences.cn: 这儿胆小鬼的臭气太重了.

sentences.en: They dignified cowardice by calling it prudence.
sentences.cn: 他们把怯懦美其名曰为谨慎.

sentences.en: They gibed at me for my cowardice.
sentences.cn: 他们因我的胆小而嘲弄我.

sentences.en: When he thinks of the tattered soldier he recalls his cowardice.
sentences.cn: 想起那个褴褛兵,他立即联想到自己的懦弱.
